abstract: Prosecutors in Boston Marathon bombings trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev are focusing on role of Katherine Russell, Tsarnaev's sister-in-law, in preparations for the attack.
lead_paragraph: Katherine Russell, the wife of Tamerlan Tsarnaev, is emerging as an increasingly curious figure in the trial of her brother-in-law, Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the convicted Boston Marathon bomber.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Testimony on Boston Bomber’s Sister-In-Law

snippet: Katherine Russell, the wife of Tamerlan Tsarnaev, is emerging as an increasingly curious figure in the trial of her brother-in-law, Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the convicted Boston Marathon bomber.
